features.name: multipleCVEs
features.description:
adding all unresolved CVEs that are present in Alpine linux. Note that the vulnerabilities are possibly present, so there may be false positives. 
 Warming, this script will remove and download mutiple binaries, it will take very long and may interfere with services running on the benchmark.

features.name: coap
features.description: Installs a modular coap server running as root. Possible packet amplification. Does not inherently have vulnerabilities, but serves any vulnerability with the <interface> property

features.name: CVE-2021-43521
features.description:
adding Zlib 1.2.15 containing CVE-2021-43521. 
 other CVE's are also possible, but are not tested and are unsure.

features.name: CVE-2021-34431
features.description:
adding Mosquitto version 1.6.3-r0, that has the CVE-2021-34431. 
 other CVE's are also possible, but are not tested and are unsure.

features.name: CVE-2019-14287
features.description:
adding Sudo version 1.8319_p1_r0, this version in vulnerable to CVE-2019-14287. 
 other CVE's are also possible, but are not tested and are unsure.

features.name: CVE-2020-8794
features.description:
adding Opensmtpd version 6.0.3p1-r3 which is vulnerable to CVE-2020-8794. 
 other CVE's are also possible, but are not tested and are unsure.

features.name: vulnerable http server
features.description: Installing http server with multiple vulnerabilities: SQL injection, XSS, CSRF and a information leak

features.name: cInterfaceSQLI
features.description: Adding binaries written in c that contains sql injection that can communciate with certain protocols

features.name: cInterfaceCI
features.description: Adding binaries written in c that contains command injection that can communciate with certain protocols

features.name: cInterfaceBOF
features.description: Adding binaries written in c that contains buffer overflow that can communciate with certain protocols

features.name: vulnerable ssh
features.description: SSH service with backdoor

features.display_name: Vulnerable SUID rights on the env binary

features.display_name: Vulnerable SUID rights on the cat binary
features.description: Adding SUID rights that can be exploited. On the cat binary

features.description: Adding python Path traversal

features.description: Adding python command injection

features.description: Adding python Path traversal

features.description: Adding python server side template injection

features.name: cronjobWCI
features.description: adding cronjobs to cron that are vulnerable, one with a wildcard injections

features.name: cronjobCWBP
features.description: adding cronjobs to cron that are vulnerable, one with a wildcard injections, and another with bad permissions
vulnerabilities: Command injection in file executed as root by cron

features.name: badSudoRightsVI
features.display_name: Misconfigured sudo in the vi binary
features.description: Adding a sudo rights that can be exploited. These rights allow Path traversal using the vi binary

features.name: badSudoRightsLDP
features.display_name: Misconfigured sudo rights that result in a privilege escalitaion
features.description: Adding a sudo rights that can be exploited. These rights allow code injection with LD_PRELOAD

features.name: badSudoRightsENV
features.display_name: Misconfigured sudo rights regarding the SETENV variable
features.description: Adding a sudo rights that can be exploited. These rights allow changes to the ENV variables for a specific sudo commando

features.name: badSudoRightsPT
features.display_name: Misconfigured sudo rights leading to Path traversal
features.description: Adding a sudo rights that can be exploited. These rights allow Path traversal using the vi binary

features.name: vulnerable apache server
features.description: Installing apache server with a sql injection, XXS, CSRF a information leak, directory traversal, LFI, RCE and a Command injection

features.name: No binary protection
features.description: binary compiled without protection mechanisms

features.name: SSHKey
features.description: SSH with key that gets leaked in the firmware

features.name: SSHWC
features.description: Weak cipher used to secure SSH

features.name: SSHPRL
features.description: SSH that permits root login

features.name: SSHPEM
features.description: SSH with key that gets leaked in the firmware

features.name: customTelnet
features.description: A python telnet server that uses hardcoded credentials

features.name: vsftpCHOWN
features.description: Bad CHOWN permissions in the VSFTP service

features.name: vsftpLOGIN
features.display_name: Misconfigured VSFTP with anonymous login permitted
features.description: Anonymous login is allowed in the VSFTP server, in combination with other wrong configurations it can be considered a vulnerability

features.name: vsftpWRITE
features.display_name: Misconfigured VSFTP with write permissions enabled
features.description: Write permissions are enabled in the VSFTP server, in combination with an anonymous login and the wrong permissions it is considered a vulnerability
